contents.question: How do I change my password?
contents.answer:
To change your password, follow these steps: 

 1. Go to your profile settings 
 2. Click on the 'Change Password' button 
 3. Enter your new password 
 4. Click on the 'Save Changes' button

contents.text: Welcome to the platform! To get started, simply create an account and start exploring. You can find new friends, join groups, and participate in discussions.

contents.title: Using the feed
contents.caption: The feed is the main hub of activity on the platform.

contents.question: How do I upload a photo?
contents.answer:
To upload a photo, follow these steps: 

 1. Go to your profile settings 
 2. Click on the 'Upload Photo' button 
 3. Select a photo from your device 
 4. Click on the 'Save Changes' button

contents.text: The platform is a great place to share your photos and connect with others. You can upload photos to your profile and share them with your friends.

contents.title: Uploading photos
contents.caption: Uploading photos is easy and fun on the platform.

contents.text: How to share photos on the platform

contents.question: How do I join a group?
contents.answer:
To join a group, follow these steps: 

 1. Go to the groups section 
 2. Browse the groups directory 
 3. Click on the 'Join' button for the group you want to join 
 4. Wait for the group admin to approve your request
